issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

fields.summary: Android: Build fails using build tools higher than 24.0 and Java 1.7

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:

the problem from build tool 

http://stackoverflow.com/questions/35990995/com-android-dx-command-main-unsupported-major-minor-version-52-0

how i can downgrade build tool in appcelerator to "23.0.2" ? 

sorry for my english :D
fields.summary: Android not lunching anymore by 24.0.0 rc1

comments.body:
Is this still valid for sierra? https://support.apple.com/kb/DL1572?locale=en_US
Haven't updated yet :)
Hello, we have some major updates on our SDK 6.0.0RC for Android. Can you try with that? Thanks.
